metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14679 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in mspack/chmd.c in libmspack before 0.7alpha.There is an off-by-one error in the CHM PMGI/PMGL chunk number validitychecks, which could lead to denial of service (uninitialized datadereference and application crash).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14679` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmspack0 - 0.5-1ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmspack package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.5-1ubuntu0.16.04.2').
